We will provide a list of nearby accommodations to the venue soon! Thank you for your patience.

The organizing committees of two co-located events, EHST'19 and FFHMT'18, have decided to allow registrants of either conference to attend sessions from both events. As a result, we encourage attendees to study the program for both conferences and attend the sessions which they may find relevant/interesting.
For more information about the conferences, please view the Conference Flyer.
